  • Method Details

    • getTaskRunState

      int getTaskRunState()

    • getTaskLastStartTime

      long getTaskLastStartTime()

    • getTaskLastEndTime

      long getTaskLastEndTime()

    • getTaskSuccessCount

      long getTaskSuccessCount()
      Returns the number of times this task has completed successfully. A cancelled task can still complete successfully.
      Returns:
      the number of times this task has completed successfully

    • getTaskFailureCount

      long getTaskFailureCount()
      Returns the number of times this task has failed. A cancelled task can fail
      Returns:
      the number of times this task has failed

    • getTaskCancelCount

      long getTaskCancelCount()
      This method returns the number of times this task has been cancelled. A cancelled task can still complete successfully or fail. Depending on whether it completes successfully or fails, the task will be marked as completed or failed, and the corresponding success or fail counters will be incremented.
      Returns:
      the number of times this task has been cancelled

    • getTaskRunCount

      long getTaskRunCount()
      Returns the number of times this task has been scheduled to run. The task could have completed successfully, failed or cancelled.
      Returns:
      the number of times this task has been scheduled to run

    • getTaskScheduledCount

      long getTaskScheduledCount()

    • getTaskTotalRunTime

      long getTaskTotalRunTime()
      Returns the total time this task has run in milliseconds. This includes the time spent in failed, cancelled and successful runs.
      Returns:
      the total time this task has run in milliseconds.
